title: Seven nations battle for OFC U - 19 women glory in Tahiti
body_text:
The road to the FIFA U-20 Women’s World Cup in Poland runs straight through Tahiti, where the OFC U-19 Women’s Championship is set to kick off this weekend. Seven nations will compete for the region's two coveted spots in next year's global tournament.
Defending champions New Zealand enter as the team to beat, but a rapidly improving Oceania football landscape means their title defense will be anything but easy.
